name: 1-Bit Dungeon
description:
1-Bit Dungeon

Explore procedurally generated 1-bit dungeons, while fighting monsters to survive!

Survive 5 procedurally generated levels to win. Potions and food are littered throughout the levels to help... or hinder you!

Controls
 - Use the arrow keys or WASD to move
 - Move into an enemy to attack them
 - Move over an item to pick it up
 - Move into a door to open it
 - Use the mouse to control the UI
